author: hlship
msg: Improve the documentation for the input validation guide, adding screenshots to show decorations

author: olegk
msg: HTTPCORE-29: DefaultConnectingIOReactor.execute propagates IOException, but isn't really re-callable
* I/O reactor implementations re-throw all fatal I/O exceptions as IOReactorException (subclass of IOException)
* All non-fatal I/O exceptions are passed onto a user defined event dispatcher
* Default implementation of the listening I/O reactor now can use an optional exception handler to detemine whether an I/O exception thrown while accepting a new connection is fatal or not
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: sichen
msg: OFBIZ-654:  Approved product requirements by vendor screen.  This is an interesting screen as it uses two view entities chained together to perform a two-level query.  One view entity is a subquery to group requirements, the next one calls it and counts the results.

author: dain
msg: Split PersistenceDeployer between DeploymentLoader, ConfigurationFactory, and PersistenceBuilder for xml loading, config info creation and entity manager factory creation respectively.
